question:
Many poets ________ the primacy of meter over words: Stephen Fry, in his book, The Ode Less Traveled, argues that rhythm is essential in poetry, whereas deeper meaning is less important.
Two Answers
A. stress
B. acknowledge
C. allow
D. immolate
E. underscore
F. decry
